author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Central European Media Says Qtrly Net Revenues Increased 25% At Actual Rates To US$ 139.2 Mln
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Central European Media Enterprises Ltd :
* QTRLY NET REVENUES INCREASED 25% AT ACTUAL RATES AND 7% AT CONSTANT RATES TO US$ 139.2 MILLION
* QTRLY OPERATING INCOME INCREASED 61% AT ACTUAL RATES AND 43% AT CONSTANT RATES TO US$ 20.9 MILLION
* QTRLY OIBDA INCREASED 45% AT ACTUAL RATES AND 26% AT CONSTANT RATES TO US$ 30.7 MILLION
* QTRLY INCOME FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS PER SHARE $0.01 * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $646.5 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* WILL REPAY EUR 110.0 MILLION OF DEBT WITH PROCEEDS FROM NEWLY EXERCISED WARRANTS Source text for Eikon:
